result.title: SKIES Data Management Plan
result.description: Set up an appropriate data management plan DMP in accordance with WP4 and H2020 regulations The data management plan will include project standards a framework for evaluation and assessment during the project and a suggested list of approaches that partners may use The plan will be developed and updated in collaboration with the partners throughout the lifetime of the projectAn Open Research Data Pilot will be integrated into this deliverableThe due date is M4 for the ORDP and the DMP
